about_the_game:
The Purrfect Date Original Soundtrack by Oliver 'Age 24' Hindle featuring 18 original songs.

Fully remastered by Oliver, you'll find the files in your Steam directory upon purchase: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Purrfect Date\Soundtrack OST



#01 - A Mew Beginning
#02 - Vocal Cats
#03 - Fanfare
#04 - Catatonia
#05 - Realisation
#06 - Pretty Kitty
#07 - Prowling
#08 - Warm Welcome
#09 - Low Tide
#10 - Caterwaul
#11 - The Antidote
#12 - Faithful Friend
#13 - Introspection
#14 - Naughty Kittens
#15 - Nostalgia
#16 - Elementary
#17 - Summer Time
#18 - High Tea (The Mad Catters) [Featuring Emil Lundin]
detailed_description:
The Purrfect Date Original Soundtrack by Oliver 'Age 24' Hindle featuring 18 original songs.

Fully remastered by Oliver, you'll find the files in your Steam directory upon purchase: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Purrfect Date\Soundtrack OST



#01 - A Mew Beginning
#02 - Vocal Cats

name: Purrfect Date Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: ​Intel Celeron N2830 / Intel Core 2 Duo T7300 / Athlon 64 X2 TK-55 or equivilent
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 / Nvidia GT 520
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225 / AMD FX-6300 / Core i5-4300M
  • Graphics: ​Intel HD Graphics 4000

short_description: The Purrfect Date Original Soundtrack by Oliver 'Age 24' Hindle featuring the 17 full-length original songs from Visual Novel/Dating Sim Purrfect Date.
